resources.string:
Jieshuo Screenreader is a software that aims to make it easier for blind people to use Android-powered mobile phones more effectively. We have made some innovations in the human-machine interaction sphere. We know that fully understanding our software might take time, so we warmly encourage you to explore the settings to get help or contact us.
 Some functions are restricted and will only be unlocked after you purchase the full version of the app. For further details, please visit the official Telegram group.
 
 The most notable features of this screenreader include:
 Voice assistant: type, chat with friends or use your mobile phone without even touching it.
 Extension system: gain endless possibilities with the advanced extension system. Either download ready-made extensions or create your own.
 List browsing mode, node browsing mode, automatic browsing mode, full-text browsing mode, granular browsing mode or character by character browsing mode: always find the content you need with these powerful navigation aids.
 Lift your finger to activate the item under it: rapidly navigate arround the interface, with no need to remember countless gestures.
 Custom sound schemes: always delight your ears with the sound scheme that suits you best.
 Copying and selection: always select and copy just what you need.
 Dynamic gestures: Jieshuo adapts to current on-screen conditions, choosing the most appropriate gesture scheme according to the situation you are in.
 Extensible custom gestures system: remap any possible gesture to your liking, create a completely new gesture scheme and share it with friends.
 Dual-voice engine: use two synthesizers at the same time so that unimportant content will never disturb your main reading.
 
 After purchasing the app, you gain access to the following features:
 Virtual screen: an inaccessible software is no longer an unsurmountable barrier. Open up a completely new world for yourself thanks to this feature.
 Automatic OCR recognition: wherever you touch, the OCR engine will accompany you to learn about even inaccessible data.
 Automatic message reading: automatically read messages from QQ, YY, Tiktok and many more.
 Automatic subtitle reading: watching foreign movies has never been easier! Automatically read video subtitles and make your life easier.
 CAPTCHA recognition: use the advanced AI features to recognize CAPTCHA images with lightning speed.
 Jieshuo Camera: Learn about scenes, images, people and text arround you.
 Web-content filtering: never let unimportant content disturb your reading. Filter images, advertisement texts and other unwanted elements.
 List copying: say goodbye to the tedious methods used to copy long lists. One click is enough to copy even the longest list.
 Article reading mode: automatic page turning, content filtering or background reading mode. Let Jieshuo Screenreader become your E-Book reader too.
 Per-app gesture schemes: create gesture schemes just for one application. This feature offers endless possibilities.
 Favorites: collect frequently used content anytime, anywhere and access it easily.
 Granular editing mode: Edit the text by character, word or paragraph faster, and make all desired changes accurately.
 Full text selection: select by characters, words or paragraphs to copy the text just where you want.
 Custom voice commands: Powered by the same engine that drives the extension system, endless possibilities of customizing and adjusting the voice assistant await you.
 Self-launching extensions: automatically launch extensions at the specified time intervals.
 Jieshuo Screenreader is as much ours as it is yours. Create your own Jieshuo experience with endless configuration options.
Jieshuo Screenreader is powered by some technologies like Tencent Youtu, Tencent AI, Baidu Voice, Baidu Translation, Baidu LBS, Baidu MTJ, Google Translate and Andro Lua +
Controls the rate of the currently selected TTS engine
Controls whether various useful hints related to the currently focused item are read or not
Controls whether Jieshuo Screenreader uses haptics to provide information
Controls whether speech is stopped when the proximity sensor is approached

Controls whether the node browsing mode is the default navigation mode

Controls whether a high-quality TTS engine is used. If the Wi-fi is disconnected, the TTS engine is switched back to the lower quality, offline engine

Controls whether the OCR engine is used when an unlabelled item, a picture or any other inaccessible control is touched. Please note that, while this function is enabled, more data and power will be consumed
This feature is supported only on Android 5 and above

Controls whether the default gesture scheme is always used in character by character browsing mode, even if a per-application gesture scheme is present

Controls whether the multi-column menu is used by default. Please note that multi-column menus do not support custom content
Controls whether the swipe gestures are inverted in the default gesture scheme. When they are inverted, left and right swipes navigate by items while up and down swipes execute the shortcut actions
使用传统的上一个焦点移动方式
Display the current per-app gestures menu on long press
Display unavailable actions in the current per-app gestures menu

传统方式上一个焦点是下一个焦点的简单返回，取消后将使用新的上一个焦点方式，按照焦点层级返回，在一直向上浏览时更容易掌握内容所属关系

Controls whether the headset key is used to control the screenreader. The short press of the key moves the focus to the next item, a medium-length press activates the element under the focus, and finally the long press of the key activates the voice assistant

Controls whether the relationship data between elements is read in the node browsing mode. The information read consists of number of child elements the current node has, plus some additional, node-specific information.
Controls whether the index of the currently focused list item is read while navigating the list
Controls whether the visual display range of the list is read automatically when scrolling commands are used

Controls whether changes to the currently focused progress bar are read automatically
Controls whether changes in the currently focused item are read automatically
Controls whether changes in the current window are automatically read
Enabling this option might help fixing errors related to adding custom labels
Controls whether images that don\'t contain the alternative descriptions should be filtered
Controls whether the non-chinese content should be filtered out while browsing webpages
Swipe right from the left edge of the screen
Swipe left from the right edge of the screen
Controls whether the edge gestures are enabled. Edge gestures are swipes performed from the very left or right edge of the screen with either one or two fingers

Allows to set the action to be triggered when the left swipe from the very right edge of the screen is performed

Allows to set the action to be triggered when the left swipe from the very right edge of the screen is performed and the final position is held for one second

Allows to set a custom action to be triggered when the volume down key is pressed

Allows to set the custom action to be triggered when the two volume keys are pressed simultaneously, note that there should be a very short delay between pressing the 1st volume key and the other before releasing them together
Simultaneous press of the two volume keys
Allows to set a secondary TTS engine used for reading notifications and other secondary content. Setting the same engine as the main voice engine is equivalent to using just a single TTS engine
Allows to set the main TTS engine used to read content. In case the TTS engine fails to read, Jieshuo will fall back on the next available TTS engine
It is recommended to check this option if the screenreader is often killed by the system battery optimization mechanisms
Controls whether incoming messages in chatting apps such as QQ or We Chat are automatically read

Controls whether the notifications should be queued for reading. When this option is enabled, notifications are read one by one as they come in,while when it is disabled, the previous notification is interrupted while the new one comes in. Please note that this option only works while the secondary TTS engine is active
Controls whether the time should be automatically read at the specified intervals
Use voice dictation when holding your finger on the text box
Append the text to the text box when using voice dictation
Use the enhanced screenreader killing prevention mechanism
Setting this option will prevent the battery optimization service from killing the screenreader. It does this by setting Jieshuo Screenreader as the foreground window while the screen is dimmed
It is recommended to check this option when the standby power consumbtion is too high
Use gestures to switch candidates while typing
Controls whether shortcut swipes switch between candidates while typing. This option is supported by the iFlytek Input Method, Google Pinyin input method and Google Zhuyin input method
Use the volume keys to move the edit cursor and change slider values

Controls whether the accessibility volume channel is used for generating speech. Please note that this option is supported only when the system TTS engine is used

Selecting this option lets you restore settings from a previously created backup. Please note that this option will overwrite your current settings
Selecting this option lets you create a full backup of your current settings. Please note that this option will overwrite your current backup
Controls whether the custom labels are automatically downloaded from and uploaded to the server
Use the direct click instead of accessibility click
%s is available only for users of the full version
Controls whether a direct click is used instead of accessibility click. This option simulates a physical click in the element\'s position, which might improve accessibility of some applications
Consult, purchase, transfer licenses. Please be sure to contact only the certified personnel
Read the whole window up on window change
Controls whether the shortcut keys can be used to quickly scroll long lists
Clicking \"OK\" will restore the default settings
Controls whether the multi-part gestures are used. To execute a multi-part gesture, you first execute the main gesture and after its done you execute the second gesture

Controls whether fingerprint reader gestures are recognized by the screenreader. Please note that this option works only on Android 8 and above, and that it works only when the fingerprint reader is placed at the back of the phone

Controls whether you can open an application by just saying its name. When this option is unchecked, use the \"open\" keyword with the name of the application you wish to open
Controls whether you can click an element by just saying its name. When this option is unchecked, use the \"click\" keyword with the name of the element you wish to click

Controls whether the edge gesture menu is pulled out with two fingers. When this option is checked, it is possible to use other edge gesture actions with one finger

This function is still in beta. It allows to accelerate the TTS engine beyond its maximum available rate. It is not guaranteed to support all TTS engines

Recording started. Say instructions one by one, and finally say \"stop recording\" to finish

Use the custom Baidu OCR API data
Allows you to use your own API data for the Baidu OCR, taking advantage of the more accurate OCR features. Please go to https:ai.baidu.com to create an account
Please go to https:ai.baidu.com to register. After registration enter the API data in order to recognize text, animals, plants or currency
Controls what language is used while recognizing text,. This option works only when the Tencent Cloud OCR engine is selected
Allows to set custom settings related to the Baidu OCR engine. This option works only when Baidu is selected as the OCr engine

Controls whether all types of controls are announced on webpages. If the option is off, only the most important control types like links, headings and buttons are read
I did not understand your message
This node already has a label. There is no need to add a custom label
Check display pop-up window permission status
Check ignore battery optimization permission status

Welcome to Jieshuo Screenreader! This software aims to help blind people use their phones more efficiently. Click on the \"Setup wizard\" to set basic settings of the screenreader, click on \"Permission help\" to view the privacy policy or click \"Exit\" to close

First, let\'s set the basic operation mode of the screenreader. By default, Jieshuo Screenreader uses the up swipe to move to the previous element, down swipe to move to the next element and left and right swipes to execute the so-called shortcuts. If you are used to more traditional screenreader operation, please choose the \"Invert swipe gestures\" option here. It should be noted that, when this change is applied, the up swipe will execute the so-called left shortcut, while the down swipe will execute the right shortcut. Now, please swipe down in order to find the option you wish to set, and double tap to activate it

Next, let\'s decide whether you wish to receive usage hints from the screenreader. Usage hints are short messages spoken on any element. These messages can help you to operate a given control, but if you are already familiar with the screenreader operation, it is recommended to switch them off for faster experience. Do you wish to receive these hints?

Lists are a very important part of the Android user interface. Now you will decide whether you want the screenreader to read various information about the current list, notably the index of the currently focused element, or the display range of the list. Do you wish this information to be read?

Please select whether you want the screenreader to read notifications. Notifications include incoming SMS messages, weather forecasts, or any other information generated by your device. It is recommended to enable notifications, but if you don\'t want to be interrupted during your work, you can switch them off. It is worth noting that Jiesuo Screenreader has a feature called Notification Box, which might make it much easier to view notifications on some devices

Jieshuo Screenreader can use two TTS engines at the same time. The main TTS engine will be used to read most of the information, while the secondary TTS engine will be used to read notifications and other less important content.
Use two TTS engines at the same time.

读取电话状态 用于确定身份的唯一性提供个性化服务与账户认证， 用于监听电话状态为快速接听/拒绝电话等功能提供状态信息， 用于来电报号。
 接听电话 在安卓8及更高系统提供快速接听/拒绝电话等功能。
 拨打电话 在提取号码和语音报号中提供直接拨打功能。
 位置信息 用于提供基于位置的个性化服务，如当地天气，当前位置及以后可能扩展的地图与导航服务。
 相机 用于拍照和各种识别功能。
 麦克风 语音助手，语音输入的录制音频。
 通讯录 语音拨打电话和来电报号时基于人名的服务。
 悬浮窗 显示菜单和黑屏模式的对话框和窗体。
 创建桌面快捷方式 为扩展工具（轻应用）提供添加到桌面方便启动的功能。
 应用内安装 用于自动升级。
 网络访问，用户验证，图片识别，云端标签，语音识别 。
 开机启动 为在重启后能第一时间提供服务。
 防止手机休眠 在语音播报时阻止屏幕关闭。
 禁用部分权限可能导致部分功能不能正常运行

JieshuoScreenreader needs some basic permissions to work, for instance Storage permission is used to read sound schemes, extensions or any other external data from the device. Click on \"Next\" to continue and grant all required permissions, or click \"Cancel\" to exit the software
Should you need to run the basic setup wizard again, go to General settings > Setup wizard
Basic permissions have not been granted

Jieshuo Screenreader will not work without some basic permissions that you have not yet granted. Clicking on \"Continue setup\" will grant all required permissions and continue the setup wizard, clicking \"Grant permissions\" will grant all required permissions and exit the wizard, while clicking \"Exit\" will cause some features to work incorrectly
Notification display permission has not been granted

Jieshuo Screenreader uses the notification display permissions for showing the notification icon used to resume gestures, using the killing prevention features, ETC. Granting this permission will help make the app more stable on your device
Notification display permission has been granted
Ignore battery optimization permission has not been granted

Battery optimization can help to extend battery life, but it will cause the screenreader to shut down or hibernate unexpectedly. It is recommended to grant the ignore battery optimization permission for better stability, and use the dedicated power saving mode for extending battery life
Ignore battery optimization permission has been granted
Display pop-up window permission has not been granted
Jieshuo screenreader uses the overlay windows for things like displaying menus, recognition results or for the curtain mode
Display pop-up window permission has been granted
Copy the user name and ID to clipboard

The VR visual assistant is designed to be used with a smartphone virtual reality headset and a Bluetooth remote control, but it is also possible to use it with just the phone. 
 This feature primarily assists low-vision users in seeing their surroundings, reading books or computer and TV screens through magnification and optical character recognition OCR. 
 However, due to the wide viewing angle and slow refresh rate, this function is not suitable for scenarios such as walking or traveling. If you need to observe your surroundings when you are outside, such as reading bus stop signs or navigating subway stations, please make sure to stop walking and use the VR visual assistant only when it is safe to do so. 
To use the VR visual assistant, first ensure that the phone screen is divided into two parts. Then, insert the phone into the VR headset with the screen facing you. Use the arrow keys on the remote control to change values, and press the OK button to recognize text. If you don't have a remote control, you can use the phone's or the headset's volume keys to adjust the magnification and the media control key or play-pause function for text recognition. It is also possible to use an external keyboard as a remote control. 
 Since VR headsets come in various sizes, it is important to ensure that the headset you purchase fits your phone properly. Otherwise, you may end up with a covered camera, which would significantly reduce the usability of the VR visual assistant. 
 Please note that you are responsible for any consequences of not using the VR visual assistant according to the provided instructions.
